qotd.quote: In quoting others, we cite ourselves.
qotd.author: Julio Cortázar

qotd.quote: Remember, we are our own griefs, my dear, we are our own happinesses and we are our own remedies.
qotd.author: Huseyn Raza

qotd.quote: Getting rid of a delusion makes us wiser than getting hold of a truth.
qotd.author: Ludwig Börne

qotd.quote: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself.
qotd.author: Abraham Maslow

qotd.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
qotd.author: Earl Nightingale
